items.label: GMT hand offset
items.description: Adjust to set the timezone of the pointer. 0 = GMT, which is the default.

items.label: UTC numerals enabled
items.description: Shows the 24h time scale around the outside of the face.

items.label: Seconds enabled
items.description: Be aware that this will negatively affect battery life.

items.label: Sleep mode enabled
items.description: Sleep mode updates the watchface hourly when you're asleep. When Pebble thinks you've woken up, it returns to updates every minute (or second, if the hand is shown).
